//Tips to Success StudyingActivity Student Career Studying
1. Imagine your ideal outcome.

 2. Approach college with the right attitude.

 3. Take charge of your education.

 4. Get the "whys" right.

 5. Focus on actually learning, not just on your grades.

 6. Trust the small steps.

 7. Dream bigger.

 8. Stay mindful of negative self-talk.

 9. Seek to master at least one skill better than anyone else you know.

 10.Plan on amplifying your strengths.


1. Participate in hands-on learning experiences.

 2. Make a list of your skills and achievements, with specific examples.

 3. Take advantage of your schools career services.

 4. Practice showing eagerness and enthusiasm.

 5. Learn all you can about the places you most want to work.

 6. Purchase appropriate interview attire.

 7. Cultivate a professional attitude.


1. Do the work.

 2. Minimize useless distractions.

 3. Find a few different quiet locations.

 4. Study no more than about 90 minutes at a time.

 5. Keep your body moving.

 6. Organize your notes.

 7. Stand up and explain it out loud.

 8. Seek help right away.

 9. Take advantage of your schools resources.

 10. Create flashcards.
